markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Moray Eel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=175)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Giant moray eels dwell in warm, tropical waters and build lairs in narrow, twisting caves made of coral. Their size, speed, and powerful bite make them dangerous to divers and fishermen. Giant moray eels have rubbery hides that secrete a layer of mucus, making them difficult to harm with some weapons.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Giant Moray Eel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=175)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 142</row>

**Perception** +11; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 65

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 5

**Ambush** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A target creature passes within 20 feet of the giant moray eel’s hiding place and has not detected the giant moray eel. **Effect** The giant moray eel lunges out of its hiding place, Swims directly toward the triggering creature, and makes a jaws Strike against it. The target creature is flat-footed to this attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +15 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 piercing plus Grab

**Pharyngeal Jaws** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirements** The giant moray eel has a creature grabbed in its jaws. **Effect** The giant moray eel uses its second set of jaws to pull the prey into its gullet. The eel deals 1d6+4 piercing damage to the grabbed creature and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its Swallow Whole attempts and to the DC for the creature to Escape. This effect ends if the target Escapes or the giant moray eel Swallows it Whole.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Small, 1d6+6 bludgeoning, Rupture 12

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-40" />
name: Giant Moray Eel
